column5: My place is within walking distance to parks, public transport, and Galveston Bay. NASA Space Center Houston is 9 miles away, Kemah Boardwalk 5, historic San Jacinto battleground and monument 7, Sylvan Beach 3, and 25 minutes east of downtown Houston .
